game.name: Train Simulator: China Railways DF11G
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Arriving from Just Trains, the China Railways Dongfeng DF11G is a prominent locomotive developed for passenger services across China’s national railway system.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Arriving from Just Trains, the China Railways Dongfeng DF11G is a prominent locomotive developed for passenger services across China’s national railway system.
